Blog & Article

CAREER

Training, validation, and test datasets. What is the difference?

 In the world of machine learning (ML) datasets play a fundamental role in building, training, and validating models. These data collections are not just assortments of information – they are carefully curated sets that fuel the algorithm learning process. Essentially, they serve as the foundation from which insights are derived, patterns are discerned, and predictions are generated. 12, MAY 2024

Training. What is the difference?

In the world of machine learning (ML) datasets validating models. These data collections are not just assortments of information – they are carefully curated sets that fuel the algorithm learning process. Essentially, they serve as the foundation from which insights are derived, patterns are discerned, and predictions are generated.
